title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Program for Enhancing Mathematics Education Effectiveness Through Online Learning Perceptions

context.prior_knowledge: Core secondary mathematics concepts and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Identify learner perception factors in online learning environments (instructor characteristics, social interaction, instructional design) with over 80% accuracy
Derive three core elements required for online lesson design through VR-based simulation
Develop a draft of a learner-customized online mathematics education model through project-based assessment
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
